name: Bat Swarm
description: A chittering mass of vampire bats that swarms enemies. Can split apart and reform, making them difficult to destroy.

abilities.name: Scatter
abilities.description: Disperses the swarm briefly, becoming untargetable for 1 second.

abilities.name: Vampiric Swarm
abilities.description: Passively heals the swarm for 10% of all damage dealt.
